Detailed Description

Interface used to allow the creator of a dialog to run some code when the dialog is shown.

The following example demonstrates how to use the IDialogOnShowListener. 

  //You need implement your owner OnShow Listener for Dialog
  class MyDialogOnShowListener : gaia::core::IDialogOnShowListener {
    public:
      MyDialogOnShowListener();
      virtual ~MyDialogOnShowListener();
      virtual void onShow();
  };

  void MyDialogOnShowListener::onShow() {
      //When dialog is Show, will use the callback to notify you.
      . . . .
  }

  //In your dialog, just register the callback by registerOnShowListener
  MyDialogBox* dialog = new MyDialogBox(page);
  MyDialogOnShowListener* listener = new MyDialogOnShowListener();
  if (listener == NULL) {
      //DialogOnShowListener create failure!!
      return;
  }

  if (dialog != NULL) {
    dialog->registerOnShowListener(listener);
  }
